info.p: A format that stores (mostly) uncompressed audio without header information. "Generally the discerning aspect of a real raw audio file is the lack of a signature and a header. This aspect makes determining a raw audio file's file format much more harder than interchange formats because of a lack of a signature. Also, the lack of a commonly understood header makes determining audio parameters difficult." (E. Blake) See also:
